commit.title: Add UI for gozer as separate binary

Change to use select for everything
Shutdown cleanly when the driver is stopped.
Shutdown cleanly when the driver is stopped.
Switching tasks endpoint to return JSON
Decline unused offers and remove hard-coded 5 second poll for tasks
Move task abstraction and consolidate removal logic
Add TODO to handle driver exit
Add log class to mesos lib and use throughout

Remove type.go and move types to where they're used
Add log class to mesos lib and use throughout
Auto start driver with simple New().
Whoops, forgot to use user from flags. :)
More event driven.  Far from perfect.
More cruft removal, test task of /bin/true.
Move events into MesosMaster struct.  In prep for handling events better.
First batch of package globals gone.
First cut, not finished, for comments/feedback.
Use map for lookup instead of switch. Add testing.
Add dummy test.  Nuke debug Mesos repo path.
Make timestamp a string, hack to make proto-template.go compile during test run.
Add a way to query the SHA/time the protobuf definitions were generated from.
Automatically grab tagged version of mesos source and generate new protobuf defs.
Janky fix for goprotobuf not respecting import paths.
Add start of testing (no tests).  More docs.
Nuke extra cruft, and a binary!
Adding more message types to the API translation layer.
Add missing gozer main and update .gitignore
